description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget 'HomeShell' which provides a bottom navigation shell for a restaurant app. It manages navigation between Menu, Cart, and Orders screens, displays a shopping cart badge, and customizes the bottom navigation bar appearance.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a bottom navigation shell for Menu, Cart, and Orders screens.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State class managing the current selected index, rendering the Scaffold with navigation and content.

classes.name: _GoldBadge
classes.description: A StatelessWidget displaying a shopping cart icon with a badge showing the item count, which triggers navigation to the cart.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for HomeShell.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree including AppBar, body with animated switcher, and bottom navigation bar.

methods.name: _GoldBadge.build
methods.description: Builds a stack of icon and badge, handling tap for navigation.
